content.question: In the passage, campisque excedere praestat is translated

choices.label: and he is better to remain in the fields
and it is better to depart from the fields
and let him be able to remain in the fields
and let him be able to depart from the fields

content.answer: and it is better to depart from the fields

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
